name: PDF_TABLE_text
description: Roteia texto e tabelas de um arquivo PDF. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import FileInput, BoolInput
from axiestudio.template import Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
import PyPDF2
import camelot
import pandas as pd
from typing import List

class PDFTextTableSplitterComponent(Component):
    display_name = "PDF Text and Table Splitter"
    description = "Roteia texto e tabelas de um arquivo PDF."
    icon = "file-pdf"

    inputs = [
        FileInput(
            name="pdf_file",
            display_name="Arquivo PDF",
            info="PDF contendo texto e tabelas.",
            file_types=["pdf"]
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="extract_tables",
            display_name="Extrair Tabelas",
            info="Habilita a extração de tabelas."
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="output_csv",
            display_name="Output as CSV",
            info="Retorna as tabelas no formato CSV."
        )
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Texto do PDF", name="pdf_text", method="get_pdf_text"),
        Output(display_name="Tabelas do PDF", name="pdf_tables", method="get_pdf_tables"),
    ]

    def get_pdf_text(self) -> Data:
        pdf_file = self.pdf_file
        reader = PyPDF2.PdfReader(pdf_file)

        # Extrai o texto de todas as páginas
        extracted_text = ""
        for page in range(len(reader.pages)):
            extracted_text += reader.pages[page].extract_text()

        # Retorna o texto
        return Data(data={"pdf_text": extracted_text})

    def get_pdf_tables(self) -> Data:
        if not self.extract_tables:
            return Data(data={"pdf_tables": []})  # Sem extração de tabelas

        pdf_file = self.pdf_file
        tables = camelot.read_pdf(pdf_file)

        if self.output_csv:
            # Converter tabelas para CSV
            tables_data = [table.df.to_csv() for table in tables]
        else:
            # Converter tabelas para DataFrames (lista de dicionários)
            tables_data = [table.df.to_dict() for table in tables]

        return Data(data={"pdf_tables": tables_data})
code.name: code

output_csv.name: output_csv
output_csv.info: Retorna as tabelas no formato CSV.

from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import FileInput, BoolInput
from axiestudio.template import Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
import PyPDF2
import camelot
import pandas as pd
from typing import List

class PDFTextTableSplitterComponent(Component):
    display_name = "PDF Text and Table Splitter"
    description = "Roteia texto e tabelas de um arquivo PDF."
    icon = "file-pdf"

    inputs = [
        FileInput(
            name="pdf_file",
            display_name="Arquivo PDF",
            info="PDF contendo texto e tabelas.",
            file_types=["pdf"]
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="extract_tables",
            display_name="Extrair Tabelas",
            info="Habilita a extração de tabelas."
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="output_csv",
            display_name="Output as CSV",
            info="Retorna as tabelas no formato CSV."
        )
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Texto do PDF", name="pdf_text", method="get_pdf_text"),
        Output(display_name="Tabelas do PDF", name="pdf_tables", method="get_pdf_tables"),
    ]

    def get_pdf_text(self) -> Data:
        pdf_file = self.pdf_file
        reader = PyPDF2.PdfReader(pdf_file)

        # Extrai o texto de todas as páginas
        extracted_text = ""
        for page in range(len(reader.pages)):
            extracted_text += reader.pages[page].extract_text()

        # Retorna o texto
        return Data(data={"pdf_text": extracted_text})

    def get_pdf_tables(self) -> Data:
        if not self.extract_tables:
            return Data(data={"pdf_tables": []})  # Sem extração de tabelas

        pdf_file = self.pdf_file
        tables = camelot.read_pdf(pdf_file)

        if self.output_csv:
            # Converter tabelas para CSV
            tables_data = [table.df.to_csv() for table in tables]
        else:
            # Converter tabelas para DataFrames (lista de dicionários)
            tables_data = [table.df.to_dict() for table in tables]

        return Data(data={"pdf_tables": tables_data})
